body: This is a contractor position, for a non-determined period, located in Bucharest.Responsibilities:  To assist and to ensure operational support for the direct manager;  	To coordinate the arrangements of meetings, to manage agenda, and to coordinate travel and accommodation arrangements; 	To participate in preparing materials and documents, upon request; 	To plan, to organize and to prioritize work on a daily basis in order to meet deadlines; 	To prepare routine documents as requested by the direct manager; 	To process financial documents by submitting them into the financial systems of the company; 	To manage specific system processes related to GIP Inflammation projects; 	Continuous and efficient communication with the selected agencies in order to ensure the internal and external logistics based on the defined needs; 	To keep direct contact with Sales Force Team in order to implement the projects on scope; 	Ensure intra and inter – departmental healthy and constructive relationships in order to facilitate team work; 	Keep continuous communication with Projects owners and colleagues involved based on the specific projects needs, as discussed with Country Brand Lead Inflammation for each event; 	To proactively prepare and retain all documents requested by MAPP and Country annex; 	To present a quarterly reports of document status and events organized within Inflammation Franchise; 	To complete audit requests, if the caseSkills, Knowledge, Qualifications & Experience:1 year previous experience in a similar role 	University degree 	Advanced English level 	Ability to work under pressure (e.g. cope with multi-tasks) whilst maintaining quality 	Computer literacy – Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power Point) 	Very good ability to plan, organize, prioritize 	Ability to communicate effectively verbally and in writing 	Systematic thinking and ability to work according the instructions  If you are interested in this position, please send your resume to HRRomania2@pfizer.com
title: Marketing Assistant
locations: Sos. Bucuresti-Ploiesti nr. 172-176 Cl. B Etaj 5, București, Municipiul București, România
